mapper.update: UPDATE community SET commu_title=#{commu_title}, id=#{id}, commu_content=#{commu_content}, commu_date=NOW() where commu_no=#{commu_no}
UPDATE community SET commu_count=commu_count+1 where commu_no=#{commu_no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM COMMUNITY WHERE commu_cat = 0 and 1=1 AND commu_title LIKE replace(CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'),' ','') AND commu_content LIKE replace(CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'),' ','') ORDER BY commu_cat_no DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset}
